nodes.text: Sideshow Collectibles is a California-based toy company that makes licensed action figures and movie collectibles. In 2004 they made an agreement with Lucasfilm to produce Star Wars merchandise, which over the years has taken the form of 12-inch figures, premium-format figures, life-size collectibles, and dioramas.

Often the figures come in a regular and exclusive version, the exclusive version containing different or new accessories from the regular, and only available for purchase online through Sideshow or at various conventions.
